name: Head of School
description: This administrator is responsible for all aspects of the school

name: Academic Administrator
description: This would represent either a principle or vice-principle.

name: Teacher Assistant
description: This is a local classroom teacher.

name: Academic Support
description: This employee is responsible for supporting the academic mission of the school.

name: Support Staff
description: This employee supports the non-academic mission of the school.

name: Support Administrator
description: This is an administrator or manager that supervises other support staff.

name: Facilities Staff
description: This employee provides structural and security services for the school.

name: Facilities Administrator
description: This is an administrator who supervises other facilities staff.
